PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProcessCapacity
PropertySetDef.Definition: Property set for the application of process data to spatial elements and transport assets

PropertyDef.Name: DownstreamConnections
PropertyDef.Definition: Names of downstream connected equipment and spaces (comma-separated), if not otherwise represented

PropertyDef.Name: ProcessCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of units that can be processed in the time defined in ProcessPerformance

PropertyDef.Name: ProcessPerformance
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimum time to accept or dispatch the entire item capacity.

PropertyDef.Name: UpstreamConnections
PropertyDef.Definition: Names of upstream connected equipment and spaces (comma-separated), if not otherwise represented
